entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 09:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
